title: Does God's sign share with Khamenei a picture of him reading "fire and anger "?
subtitle: It is clear that a picture showing Iran ' s Supreme Leader reading Michael Wolfe ' s controversial book about United States President Donald Trump is a true one.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The Ayatollah Ali Khamenei shared a picture of him reading Michael Wolfe's book "Fire and Anger."
